analyzed: buddhi pūrvām kriyām dṛṣṭvā sva dehe anyatra tad grahāt
jñāyate yadi dhīḥ cittamātre api eṣa nayaḥ samaḥ

original: ātmani cittaspandanapūrvau kriyābhilāpau dṛṣṭvānyatra tayordarśanādyadi spandanamanumīyeta,
analyzed: ātmani citta spandana pūrvau kriyā abhilāpau dṛṣṭvā anyatra tayoḥ darśanāt yadi spandanam anumīyeta
cittamātre nayaḥ samaḥ
atas cittamātra tā vādī api para cittam anumātum śaknoti

original: tacca kāyavāgvijñaptipratibhāsi jñānaṃ jñānāntaraspandanaveśeṣeṇa vinā bhavatyevaṃ na matam / [1-3]
analyzed: tat ca kāya vāc vijñapti pratibhāsi jñānam jñāna antara spandana veśeṣeṇa vinā bhavati evam na matam

original: atha parajñānasya kriyānupalambhāt paradhīranumātuṃ na yujyata iti cet?
analyzed: atha para jñānasya kriyā anupalambhāt para dhīḥ anumātum na yujyate iti ced

original: na; tulyatvāt paro 'pi parajñānapūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati 'taḥ tenāpi tanna jñāyate / [4-5]
analyzed: na tulya tvāt paraḥ api para jñāna pūrvau tau kadāpi na paśyati atas tena api tat na jñāyate

original: ātmanaścittasya paravartinornimittatvānupapatteḥ paracittaṃ jñāyata iti cet /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ cittasya para vartinoḥ nimitta tva anupapatteḥ para cittam jñāyate iti ced
kim na yujyate
sva samutthāpaka cittasya pratisaṃvedana abhāvāt
ātma citta śrayiṇoḥ ca ātmani darśanāt
tau api yadi yathā syātām tādṛśau upalabhyeyātām
anyathā darśanāt anya nimittam sidhyati iti ced
aparasmin api samānam eva
sva samutthāpaka cittasya saṃvedana abhāvāt

original: svacittaspandananimittake vijñaptipratibhāsinī jñāne cāntarmukhapratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahirmukhapratibhāsinī anyanimittadutpadyete / [6-12]
analyzed: sva citta spandana nimittake vijñapti pratibhāsinī jñāne ca antar mukha pratibhāsinī pratīteḥ bahis mukha pratibhāsinī
animitte eva bahirmukha pratibhāsini iti kim na iṣyate ced
a nimitta tve sarvasya a nimitta tvam prasajyeta
vicchinna avicchinna pratibhāsa kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ na jñānayoḥ spandana tva nimitta bheda vibhāga kṛt
tena avicchinna pratibhāsinoḥ api animitta tvam bhavet
viśeṣa abhāvāt

original: tathā sati, avicchinnatvaviśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsabheda eva spandanapūrvako na bhavati /
analyzed: tathā sati avicchinna tva viśiṣṭaḥ pratibhāsa bhedaḥ eva spandana pūrvakaḥ na bhavati
kintarhi vicchinnasya api kriyā viśeṣasya pratibhāsaḥ eva
śara upala prakṣepaṇa yantra nirmāṇa para pracālana ādi kriyā viśeṣa pratibhāsinām vicchinnasya api pratibhāsasya spandana pūrvaka tvāt
para kṛta cālana ādinām ca avicchinnasya api a tad pūrvaka tvāt

original: tena hyatra kriyāviśeṣamātreṇa spandanasya pratītiritī yujyate /
analyzed: tena hi atra kriyā viśeṣa mātreṇa spandanasya pratītiḥ iti yujyate
tatra yadi kasyacid pūrvaka tvam
na kaḥ api tad pūrvakaḥ syāt
viśeṣa abhāvāt
atas kriyā viśeṣa sāmānyam spandana viśeṣa sāmānyasya gamakam
tatra yathā kriyām upalabhya
ātmani spandana anupalambhāt anyatra spandana pratītiḥ
tathā kriyā pratibhāsa upalambhane api
samānam etat
paraḥ api para kriyā abhilāpayoḥ nimittam na asti iti kin nā icchati

original: tenāvaśyaṃ tau spandananimittakatvāt tadbhāve na bhavata iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: tena avaśyam tau spandana nimittaka tvāt tad bhāve na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
paraḥ api tayoḥ pratibhāsau tathā eva vadet
atas na anayoḥ parasparam bhedaḥ
yadi tatra pratibhāsinyoḥ spandana nimittaka tvam ucyate
svapna avasthāyām api kin nā ucyate
sarva samānam
paraḥ api svapna upalabdha para kriyā abhilāpau spandana nimittakau iti kin na vadati
tayoḥ abhāvāt iti ced
tathā upalabdhi sāpyāt kim na staḥ

original: atha middhenopahatatvāt puruṣasya arthaśūnyaṃ vijñānaṃ jāyata iti cet /
analyzed: atha middhena upahata tvāt puruṣasya artha śūnyam vijñānam jāyate iti ced
para mate api tasmāt eva para ādhipatya śūnyam vijñānam upajāyate

original: atha svapne 'pi jñānasyārthavattvāttadopalabhyamānā api parasantānā eveti cet /
analyzed: atha svapne api jñānasya arthavat tvāt tadā upalabhyamānāḥ api para santānāḥ eva iti ced

original: paraṃ prativigrahītuṃ yadi yuktyāgamarahitastathāvidho 'sad vādaḥ samāśriyeta,
analyzed: param prativigrahītum yadi yukti āgama rahitaḥ tathāvidhaḥ asat vādaḥ samāśriyeta

original: tadā parābhimataṃ tasya parāyattatvaṃ na ko 'pi nivārayet /
analyzed: tadā para abhimatam tasya parāyatta tvam na kaḥ api nivārayet

original: etatkeṣañcinmata eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santānāntarāyattāni /
analyzed: etat keṣañcid mate eva sarvāṇi tathāvidhāni jñānāni santāna antara āyattāni
viṣeṣaḥ tu sākṣāt paramparayā ca

original: kadācit svapne 'pi tasya sākṣāt santānāntarayattā iṣṭaiva;
analyzed: kadācid svapne api tasya sākṣāt santāna antara yattā iṣṭā eva
deva ādi adhiṣṭhānataḥ satya svapna darśanāt
tasmāt asya na etad asat vāda samāśrayaḥ
tāvat tayā kriyayā api tat cittam katham jñāyate
cittasya kārya tvāt

original: tasya kāryatvaṃ tu cittāntare 'pi tulyamiti kathanna jñāyate?
analyzed: tasya kārya tvam tu citta antare api tulyam iti katham na jñāyate

original: api ca, yadi tatkriyā svasattāmātreṇa svasantānaṃ pratyāyet,
analyzed: api ca yadi tad kriyā sva sattā mātreṇa sva santānam pratyāyet
tadā an upalabhyamānena api syāt tathā pratipattiḥ
na jñāna apekṣa tvāt liṅgasya iti ced

original: tada tatra kimanayā paramparayā - paracittāt kriyā,
analyzed: tada tatra kim anayā paramparayā para cittāt kriyā
kriyātaḥ jñānam
jñānāt tasya pratipattiḥ iti
para citta prabhava dharmi kriyā pratibhāsi jñānam eva asya gamakam bhavati
tasya adhigatiḥ tu antaśas tad āśrita tvāt

original: spandanamātrasāmānyaṃ kriyābhilāpajñānasāmānyasya kāraṇatvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ /
analyzed: spandana mātra sāmānyam kriyā abhilāpa jñāna sāmānyasya kāraṇa tvāt kāryeṇa kāraṇasya gatiḥ
tatra ātma spandana nimittakasya antar mukha vṛttiḥ
anyasya anyathā
prāyeṇa adhikṛtya asau bhedaḥ

original: etayoḥ saḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ svāpādyavasthāyāmitarasyāmapi ca samānaḥ /
analyzed: etayoḥ saḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ svāpa ādi avasthāyām itarasyām api ca samānaḥ

original: bhrāntyavasthāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ pratyayaviśeṣopāśrayāt paraspandanadinimittodbhūtavijñānavāsanaiva kadācitparābhogādeḥ vyavahitādapi vṛttiṃ labhate:
analyzed: bhrānti avasthāyām yathāsvam pratyaya viśeṣa upāśrayāt para spandana di nimitta udbhūta vijñāna vāsanā eva kadācid para ābhoga ādeḥ vyavahitāt api vṛttim labhate
na tu atyanta asat ābhogāt
tasmāt sarva avasthāsu kriyā ādi vijñapteḥ citta spandanam anumīyate eva

original: kriyātaḥ spandanapratipattau svāpa itarasmiñca syātpratipattiratha vā naiva kadācana /
analyzed: kriyātaḥ spandana pratipattau svāpe itarasmin ca syāt pratipattiḥ atha vā nā eva kadācana
para spandana bhāve api kriyā ālambana udayāt
bhavatu ālambana udayaḥ na tu kriyā
kriyayā spandanam gamyate
bhrānti avasthānām kriyā eva na bhavati
artha śūnya jñāna udayāt na doṣaḥ
sarva prakāra vyapadeśa sāmyāt kadācid jñānam artha śūnyam
anyadā anyathā iti eṣaḥ adhikāraḥ kutas labdhaḥ
atha middha ādinā avasthā anyathābhāvaḥ ced
yadi evam sambhavet
bhavatu avidyā upapluta tvāt tathā udayaḥ

original: tathā sati arthāntaravādahānyā ete 'nekāśakyanigūhanadoṣaprasaṅgāḥ mahākṛcchrā uttereṇaikena nihatā bhavanti / [52-58]
analyzed: tathā sati artha antara vāda hānyāḥ ete aneka aśakya nigūhana doṣa prasaṅgāḥ mahā kṛcchrāḥ uttereṇa ekena nihatāḥ bhavanti  /

original: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāyavāgvijñaptibhyāṃ svamutthāpakacittasyānumānamiti nyāyyam /
analyzed: nanu tayoḥ darśanāt kāya vāc vijñaptibhyām svam utthāpaka cittasya anumānam iti nyāyyam
na tu santāna antara sambaddha vijñapti pratibhāsi jñāne para vijñaptī bhavitum arhataḥ
tayoḥ anupādāna upādeya tvāt iti ced

original: nocyate paracittasamutthitavijñaptirūpatvāttatra pratibhāsijñānena samutthāpakacittaṃ gamyata iti /
analyzed: nā ucyate para citta samutthita vijñapti rūpa tvāt tatra pratibhāsi jñānena samutthāpaka cittam gamyate iti
kim tarhi tasya kārya tvāt
vijñaptiḥ iti samutthāpaka citta santānāt jāte kriyā vāc ākārake jñāne eva
samutthāpaka cittam ca tayoḥ eva upādāna kāraṇam
santāna antara jñānayoḥ tu adhipati pratyayaḥ
vijñapteḥ upādānāt te janite
tad sambandhena upacārāt vijñaptī bhavataḥ
bhavatu sva parayoḥ sva sva pratibhāsasya anubhavaḥ
taimirika dvaya dṛṣṭa dvi candra vat
tathāvidha vijñānasya hetuḥ vāsanā utpāda svabhāva biśeṣaḥ anādi kālika eka artha grāha adhyavasāyi tvāt
eka hetu sambhūtayoḥ sva para voijñapti jñānayoḥ vijñapti vena upacāraḥ

original: kiñca kriyādipratibhāsivijñānāt kāryaliṅgājjātaṃ yatparacittajñānaṃ tatparacittaṃ viṣayīkriyata āhosvinna?
analyzed: kiñca kriyā ādi pratibhāsi vijñānāt kārya liṅgāt jātam yat para citta jñānam tat para cittam viṣayīkriyate āhosvit na
viṣayīkaraṇe artha antaram syāt

original: aviṣayatve tu kathaṃ jñānena paracittasattā pratīyate?
analyzed: aviṣaya tve tu katham jñānena para citta sattā pratīyate
tad svarūpa ajñāne tad siddhaiḥ asambhavāt iti ced
eṣa prasaṅgaḥ api samaḥ

original: kriyāvāgbhyāṃ paracittaṃ pratipattimatāmapi tatsvarūpaviṣayīkaraṇe svacittajñānavat tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasajyeta /
analyzed: kriyā vāgbhyām para cittam pratipattimatām api tad svarūpa viṣayīkaraṇe sva citta jñāna vat tad ākārasya api jñānam prasajyeta

original: tadajñāne tu tena tatsvarūpasya grahaṇaṃ katham? [65-67]
analyzed: tad ajñāne tu tena tad svarūpasya grahaṇam katham

original: atha liṅgāt sāmānyadhigateḥ nākārasya pratītiriti cet?
analyzed: atha liṅgāt sāmāni adhigateḥ na ākārasya pratītiḥ iti ced
kiñca tat sāmānyam para cittam eva anyat vā āhosvit avācyam
anyatva avācya tvayoḥ eka tve tu anena tat sāmānyam eva gṛhyeta
na para cittam
tat katham anena tat gamyate
nā api sāmānyam para cittam eva

original: tathā sati tadākārasyāpi jñānaṃ prasahyeta ityuktam / [86-71]
analyzed: tathā sati tad ākārasya api jñānam prasahyeta iti uktam
na hi eṣā anumāna prakriyā
na hi anumānam artha svarūpasya grāhakam
pratyakṣa vat pratibhāsa aviśiṣṭa tva ādeḥ prasaṅgāt
tena na asya prāmāṇyam
tad svarūpa agrahe api abhipreta artha avisaṃvādāt prāmāṇyam
dhūma ādi liṅgāt jātam api na vahnaya ādi svarūpa viṣayi
dṛṣṭena aviśeṣa prasaṅgāt
anumānasya atīta ādau ca apravṛtteḥ
artha kriyā prasaṅgāt ca
para citta anumāne api abhipreta artha avisaṃvādaḥ asti eva

original: tatpravartanadvāreṇa prāṇyantarasattāṃ pratipadya punaḥ punarvyavahārapravṛttau tadādhipatyādāgārthasya prāpteḥ /
analyzed: tad pravartana dvāreṇa prāṇi antara sattām pratipadya punar punar vyavahāra pravṛttau tad ādhipatyāt āga arthasya prāpteḥ
tanmātra phala cintakasya lokasya prāṇi antara anumāne pravṛtteḥ ca
pūrva jñānena vyavahāra samāpteḥ pramāṇa tvena siddha tvāt
nanu svapne api pūrva jñānāt uttara artha pratibhāsi jñānam utpadyate
na tad mātreṇa pūrva jñānasya prāmāṇyam yujyate
tadānīm sarveṣām jñānānām bhrānta tvāt

original: tatra vijñaptijñānaṃ na kadāciccittaspandanādhipatyena vinā udbhavatītyataḥ tābhyāṃ ye anumīyate /
analyzed: tatra vijñapti jñānam na kadācid citta spandana ādhipatyena vinā udbhavati iti atas tābhyām ye anumīyate
bhrānti vaśāt kadācid vyavahite api udeti
na tu tad ādhipatya rahita tvam
viśeṣaḥ tu asti sākṣāt paramparayā ca iti uktam

original: tatra yathā pūrvavijñaptijñānānāṃ paramparayā spandanādhipatyādudayaḥ tathā taduttarāvasthābhāvināmapi /
analyzed: tatra yathā pūrva vijñapti jñānānām paramparayā spandana ādhipatyāt udayaḥ tathā tad uttara avasthā bhāvinām api
vijñapti jñāna āśraya spandana uttara avasthā citta santānāt eva paramparayā utpādaḥ

original: tatrāpi yādṛganumānaṃ tādṛgavisaṃvādo vyavahāraścāpyastyeveti kenāpi na gṛhyate / [82-86]
analyzed: tatra api yādṛś anumānam tādṛś avisaṃvādaḥ vyavahāraḥ ca api asti eva iti kena api na gṛhyate
sākṣāt para citta vidām tu katham
yadi te para cittasya svarūpam sākṣāt jānanti
tadā tasya artha antara grahaṇam syāt
atha na jānanti
katham te sākṣāt vidaḥ

original: kathaṃ nāma pratyakṣeṇārthasvarūpasya agrahaṇaṃ ca bhavati /
analyzed: katham nāma pratyakṣeṇa artha svarūpasya agrahaṇam ca bhavati
atha na gṛhyate
katham tarhi pramāṇam iti ced
aprahīṇa grāhya grāhaka vikalpa yoginām para citta jñānam api vyavahāre avisaṃvādāt eva pramāṇam
rūpa ādi darśana vat
āśraya a parāvṛteḥ
yoga balāt hi teṣām jñānam para citta ākāra viśeṣa anukāri sphuṭa ābham upajāyate
karma deva ādi adhiṣṭhāna balāt satya svapna darśana vat
teṣām api na para citta viṣayi tvena jñānam udeti

original: te 'pi tadākārasadṛśasvacittapratibhāsameva jānantītyevamavadhāraṇād paracittavida iti vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: te api tad ākāra sadṛśa sva citta pratibhāsam eva jānanti iti evam avadhāraṇāt para citta vidaḥ iti vyavahāraḥ
tad ākāra anukāri sfuṭa ābha tvāt tat pratyakṣam
avisaṃvādi tvāt ca pramāṇam iti matam
acintyaḥ hi bhagavataḥ sarva artha adhigamaḥ
sarvathā jñāna abhidhāna viṣaya atīta tvāt
ācārya dharmakīrti praṇītam santāna antara siddhi prakaraṇam samāptam
